citations.narrative:
According to the licensee, three rabbits had been sold in January and February of 2023, however records had not been
completed. In addition, records were not available for recent acquisitions and dispositions of several species, including
several births which had occurred at the facility. Records must be updated and maintained to include the required
information per this section, including but not limited to name and address of the person to whom an animal was sold, and
the date of purchase, sale or disposal.
********Correct by June 1, 2023

The chain link portion of the enclosure housing the goats and pigs was loose from the wooden support beams. The wire
had curled upwards inside of the enclosure and there were sections with jagged edges. This could cause injury to
animals. The licensee must ensure that enclosures are maintained in good repair.
**********Correct by June 1, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
According to the licensee, three rabbits had been sold in January and February of 2023, however records had not been 
completed. In addition, records were not available for recent acquisitions and dispositions of several species, including 
several births which had occurred at the facility.   Records must be updated and maintained to include the required 
information per this section, including but not limited to name and address of the person to whom an animal was sold, and 
the date of purchase, sale or disposal. 
********Correct by June 1, 2023 
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The chain link portion of the enclosure housing the goats and pigs was loose from the wooden support beams. The wire 
had curled upwards inside of the enclosure and there were sections with jagged edges. This could cause injury to 
animals. The licensee must ensure that enclosures are maintained in good repair.  
**********Correct by June 1, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
